name: Utilitarianism
shortdesc: Utilitarianism is a theory of morality, which advocates actions that foster happiness and oppose actions that cause unhappiness. Utilitarianism promotes "the greatest amount of good for the greatest number of people."

name: Kantianism
shortdesc: Kantianism is the deontological philosophy of Immanuel Kant. It is about the duty rather than emotions or end goals. The moral value of actions is based on their underlying principle.
